detectors.description:
SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Petroleum.sol#10-15) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Petroleum.sol#12)
	-_assert(a == b * c + a % b) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Petroleum.sol#13)
detectors.markdown:
